StravaR 0.1.0
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Reference

All functions

activity-class

An S4 class to represent a Strava activity.

get_activitytype()

Determine the activity type, based on the Strava gpx file title.

get_countries()

Determine the country(ies) of the lat/lon coordinates of a Strava activity

get_elevationlevel()

Catecorize the slot elevations from an S4 activity object into different levels.

get_speeds()

Calculate the velocities (km/h) of an activity for every measured point. Using the distance devided by get_timediffs.

get_timediffs()

Calculate the time difference between measured points in an activity

load_activities()

Load Strava activities from gpx files

merge_activity()

Merge different objects of S4 class activtiy into one.

parse_gpx()

Read and parse .gpx files from Strava.

`[`(<activity>,<ANY>,<ANY>,<ANY>)

Definition of the subset operator for an object of S4 class activity.

  • All functions
